default.source:
<svg class="circular-loader" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <path opacity="0.2"
        d="M24 12C24 18.6274 18.6274 24 12 24C5.37258 24 0 18.6274 0 12C0 5.37258 5.37258 0 12 0C18.6274 0 24 5.37258 24 12ZM1.92774 12C1.92774 17.5628 6.43724 22.0723 12 22.0723C17.5628 22.0723 22.0723 17.5628 22.0723 12C22.0723 6.43724 17.5628 1.92774 12 1.92774C6.43724 1.92774 1.92774 6.43724 1.92774 12Z"
        fill="currentColor" />
    <path d="M12 0C18.6274 0 24 5.37258 24 12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.92774" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

<style>
    .circular-loader {
        animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
        color: {{textcolor}};
    }

    @keyframes spin {
        0% {
            transform: rotate(0deg);
        }

        100% {
            transform: rotate(360deg);
        }
    }
</style>

mobile.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideUpFromBottom { from { transform: translateY(100%); } to { transform: translateY(0%); } }

tablet.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1); } }

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(0.95); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1); } }
